review:
Camera clarity is awesome and battery is reasonable but being it's Android,
the many feature of miui is not available. Need some improvements on feature
in phone

I have this phone (bought from fk, used for 6 months now). Absolutely amazing
phone, best I've ever had. Processor is fast for daily use, apps install
really quickly and have no hang whatsoever. Camera is stunning (especially the
blur effect). The photos might be slightly unsaturated compared to LG phones
etc, but I like it that way. The battery life isn't superb and will last for
half a day with extensive use, but it charges fully in 1 hour. Call quality is
really good too with no disconnect or dropping. What's also useful is the
release of regular patches by Google to resolve bugs that might have been
overlooked.  
Make sure you get an insurance for this though, as repairing it after water
damage etc is really expensive.
